themes.name: Purple
themes.contents:
/*
Purple
Takeover Inspired Theme
STUDIOXENIX
1
*/
body, #content {      background: rgb(245,245,245);   } #content {      margin-top: 85px;   }  #posts .post_avatar,   #posts .post {      border-radius: 0 !important;      box-shadow: 0px 0px 1px 1px rgb(190,190,190);      box-sizing:border-box;   } #right_column:after,   .right_column {      background: transparent !important;   } #header {      background: #3f1c59;      border-radius: 0px 0px 12px 12px;   } .small_links a {      color: #3f1c59 !important;   } .notification,   .controls_section {      background: #3f1c59   } #header_container {      background: #3f1c59;      position: absolute;      top: 0; left: 0;      width: 100%;   } .selection_nipple {      display: none !important;   }

themes.name: Monolithic
themes.description: A simple gray theme with no space between posts

themes.name: Flowers & Lace
Mega Rainbows
themes.contents:
/*
Mega Rainbows
Extremely colourful sidebars
dahlkzer
1
*/
body{background:repeating-linear-gradient(tobottom,red,orange,yellow,green,blue,purple,red)}.search_results_container{border-radius:6px;background:linear-gradient(tobottomright,red,orange,yellow,green,blue,purple)}#search_query{color:#000}#logo a{background:url(http://i7.minus.com/ijJTTw79OdTRu.png)}#content{background:rgba(0,0,0,0.5)}.blog_menu .selected_blog #open_blog_link{color:rgba(255,255,255,.69)!important}ul.controls_section li:nth-child(2),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(14),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(27){background:#f80!important}ul.controls_section li:nth-child(3),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(15),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(28){background:#ff0!important}ul.controls_section li:nth-child(4),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(16),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(29){background:#8f0!important}ul.controls_section li:nth-child(5),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(17),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(30){background:#0f0!important}ul.controls_section li:nth-child(6),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(18),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(31){background:#0f8!important}ul.controls_section li:nth-child(7),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(19),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(32){background:#0ff!important}ul.controls_section li:nth-child(9),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(22),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(35){background:#00f!important}ul.controls_section li:nth-child(10),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(23),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(36){background:#80f!important}ul.controls_section li:nth-child(11),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(24),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(37){background:#f0f!important}ul.controls_section li:nth-child(12),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(25),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(38){background:#f08!important}ul.controls_section{border:none!important}.controls_section li a{color:rgba(0,0,0,0.6667)}.selection_nipple{border-bottom:12px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.5)!important}.post_permalink{background:url(data:image/png;base64,)!important}.post .post_content blockquote{border-left:3px solid red}.post .post_content blockquote blockquote{border-left:3px solid #f80}.post .post_content blockquote blockquote blockquote{border-left:3px solid #ff0}.post .post_content blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote{border-left:3px solid #8f0}.post .post_content blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote{border-left:3px solid #0f8}.post .post_content blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote{border-left:3px solid #0ff}.post .post_content blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote{border-left:3px solid #08f}.post .post_content blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote{border-left:3px solid #00f}.post .post_content blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote{border-left:3px solid #80f}.post .post_content blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote{border-left:3px solid #f0f}.post .post_content blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote{border-left:3px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.75)}.tab_notice,.xim_message_title,.search_form_row{background:repeating-linear-gradient(toright,red,orange,yellow,green,blue,purple)!important}.pill.notice{background:repeating-linear-gradient(tobottomright,red,orange,yellow,green,blue,purple)!important}.search_form_row{box-shadow:0 0 8px #000}.tab_notice_nipple{background:rgba(255,255,255,0)!important}.tab_notice_value,.pill.notice{color:#fff;text-shadow:1px 1px 0 #000, -1px -1px 0 #000, 1px -1px 0 #000, -1px 1px 0 #000}#right_column,#right_column:after{background:rgba(0,0,0,0)}li#popover_button_blogs,ul.controls_section li:first-child,ul.controls_section li:nth-child(13),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(26){background:red!important}ul.controls_section li:nth-child(8),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(20),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(33),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(8),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(21),ul.controls_section li:nth-child(34){background:#08f!important}.post .post_content blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote,.post .post_content blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote blockquote{border-left:3px solid #0f0}

themes.name: Nebula
themes.description: Modern, translucent dashboard theme with nebula background
themes.contents:
/*
Nebula
Modern, translucent dashboard theme with nebula background
internet-tears
1
*/
body,.send_fan_mail,.chrome.blue,.chrome.clear{background:url(http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7390/8718908101_4cd0e29183_o.jpg) no-repeat top left fixed;-webkit-background-size:cover;-moz-background-size:cover;-o-background-size:cover;background-size:cover;border-radius:0;-webkit-border-radius:0;-moz-border-radius:0}.plexi.show.color{background:rgba(0,0,0,0.8)}.chrome.blue{border:none}.controls_section .with_subtitle small{color:rgba(255,255,255,.69)}.dashboard_options_form,.tag_psa,.grey_note{border-radius:0;-webkit-border-radius:0;-moz-border-radius:0;border:none;background:rgba(0,0,0,0.3);color:rgba(255,255,255,0.6)}.dashboard_options_form .dashboard_options_form_disclaimer a,.crushes_subhead,.chrome.clear{color:rgba(255,255,255,0.6)}.split button.chrome:active:not([disabled]),.split.active .chrome.options,.split .chrome.blue[disabled],.split .chrome.blue[disabled]:active,.split .chrome.blue.ui_disabled,.split .chrome.blue.ui_disabled:active{background:url(http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7390/8718908101_4cd0e29183_o.jpg) no-repeat top left fixed;border:1px rgba(255,255,255,0.4)}#content *{border-radius:0!important;-webkit-border-radius:0!important;-moz-border-radius:0!important}.xim_contact .xim-avatar{border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);border-radius:0;-webkit-border-radius:0;-moz-border-radius:0}.xim_contact .count.xim-status{margin-top:-7px}.xim-no-contacts-placeholder{text-shadow:none;padding:6px 0 0 6px !important}#xim_avatar,#xim_avatar .online,.notification .notification_right .preview_frame,.notification .avatar_frame,.ui_avatar .frame,.xim_message_title .xim-avatar{border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.7)}.xim_message_title{border-radius:0;-webkit-border-radius:0;-moz-border-radius:0;background:url(http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7390/8718908101_4cd0e29183_o.jpg) no-repeat top left fixed}#xim-add-person{background:transparent!important}li#xim-contacts-online,li#xim-contacts-offline{background:transparent!important;color:rgba(234,244,255,0.4)}li#xim-no-contacts-found-online,li#xim-no-contacts-found-offline,.pill.notice,.footer_links a,.dashboard_options_form .dashboard_options_form_disclaimer,.grey_note a,.split button.chrome:active:not([disabled]),.split.active .chrome.options{color:rgba(234,244,255,0.4)}#content{background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);border-radius:0}#header .selection_nipple{border-bottom:12px solid #FFF}.notification,.notification.first_notification{background:rgba(255,255,255,0.1);border-radius:0;-webkit-border-radius:0;-moz-border-radius:0}#right_column:after{background:none!important;content:none}.controls_section{border-radius:0;-webkit-border-radius:0;-moz-border-radius:0;background:rgba(255,255,255,0.05)}#new_post,.post{background:rgba(255,255,255,1.0);border-radius:0;-webkit-border-radius:0;-moz-border-radius:0}.post_content,#right_column{background:transparent!important;border-radius:0;-webkit-border-radius:0;-moz-border-radius:0}

themes.name: Crocodile Green
themes.description: Crocodile skin background w/ green trim.
themes.contents:
/*
Crocodile Green 
Crocodile skin background w/ green trim.
crocodilesinbusinesssuits
1
*/

body{background:#041705;background-image:url(http://media.tumblr.com/e36d38530c1106a037ccb7a348c9ea5d/tumblr_inline_mox4uctYE91qz4rgp.jpg);background-attachment:fixed;margin:0}#content{background:#1b331b}.post{background:#152715;border-radius:10px}.post_content{background:transparent!important}#right_column:after{background:none!important}.controls_section li{background:#152715}

themes.name: White Tumblr
themes.contents:
/*
White Tumblr
A basic white dashboard theme
period-doritos
1
*/
body.layout_standard, #pagination a, #auto_pagination_loader { background: #ffffff; border: none; } #content, .search_results #content { Background-color: #ffffff; } #header .selection_nipple { border-bottom: 12px solid #000000; } .controls_section, .radar .radar_post, .dashboard_options_form, .tag_psa, .post_avatar, .notification.single_notification, .controls_section .recessed, .controls_section .recessed:hover { Background: #ffffff; Border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.18); } .post_full .post_body, .post_full .post_body a, .post .post_tags a { font-size: 12px !important; line-height: auto; } .post_full .post_body big { font-size: larger; line-height: auto; } .post_full .post_body small { font-size: smaller; line-height: auto; } .controls_section li a, #right_column #popover_button_blogs .link_arrow, #blog_url_arrow, #right_column .small_links, .sidebar_link, .return_to_top .return_to_top_icon, #return_to_bottom .return_to_bottom_icon, #header .tab.iconic a, .popover_blogs span, .radar .radar_button i, .radar .radar_tumblelog_label, .notification .notification_sentence, .xtag .result, .xtag, #fan_mail_controls div, .no_posts_found, #logo a, #xim_avatar { -webkit-filter: invert(1); } .controls_section a .count, .xbookmark a::after { -webkit-filter: grayscale(1); } #dashboard_controls a, #dashboard_controls .control, .notification .report, .notification .block, a.xkit-reply-button, .xim-contacts-separator { -webkit-filter: invert(1) grayscale(1); Text-shadow: none; } #right_column:after { Background: transparent; } .dashboard_options_form, .tag_psa, .footer_links a:hover, #pagination a, .post_full .post_avatar .queue .publish_info.time { Color: rgba(0,0,0,.7); } .dashboard_options_form .dashboard_options_form_disclaimer, .dashboard_options_form .dashboard_options_form_disclaimer a, .footer_links a, #pagination a:hover, .post_full .post_avatar .queue .publish_info.day { Color: rgba(0,0,0,.4); } .blog_menu .selected_blog #open_blog_link, .controls_section li .blog small { Color: rgba(255,255,255,.4); } .notification .report, .notification .block, a.xkit-reply-button { Color: #000000 !important; } .notification .notification_sentence { max-width: 460px; } .notification.can_ignore:hover .notification_sentence .hide_overflow { max-width: 380px; } #dashboard_tumblelog_settings #content { Background-color: #ffffff; } #dashboard_tumblelog_settings #header .selection_nipple { Border: none; } a#xshufflequeue_button { background-position: 10px 25% !important; } .xhighlighter_highlightered_post { Box-shadow: 0px 0px 6px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.45); } .post_full .post_body, #source_editor { Padding: 0px; } .bluthSkin table.mceLayout tr.mceLast td { Height: 12px; } .post_full .post_permalink { background: #ffffff url('http://static.tumblr.com/gwc9rra/Lx3mqcrmf/transparent-pagination.png'); width: 25px; height: 25px; top: -10px; right: -10px; }

themes.name: Starry Nights
themes.description: A purple-toned theme with a nebula background
